des:
Math Questions is an Alexa skill designed to challenge you with math problems of all kinds!

🎲 SINGLE PLAYER MODE 🎲

• Solve math questions by answering "yes" or "no."
• Earn points: Each correct answer gives you 1 point.
• Check your score: At any time, you can ask for your accumulated points by saying "stop."
• After every 10 questions, your total score will be announced.

🎲 MULTIPLAYER MODE 🎲

• Challenge your friends or family! Now you can play multiplayer mode with up to 4 players.
• Every 20 questions, the players' scores will be revealed to see who’s ahead.

🎲 NEW UPGRADE 🎲 

• Now with the new update alexa whenever you get the question wrong will give an explanation of the correct question. 

HAVE FUN! Test your math skills, compete with others, and find out who’s the best at solving math problems!

Try multiplayer mode now and see who among your friends or family is the math whiz!

To create a Routine in the Alexa app on your mobile device:

1. Go to the menu and select Routines.
2. Select the + icon in the top right corner.
3. Select When This Happens, and then choose how to trigger the Routine.
4. Select Add Skill, and then choose which game you want to play.
5. Under From, select which device controls the routine.
6. Tap Create.
